[Hexo](https://hexo.io/) Blog[ikook Blog](http://ikookblog.com/) ! Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues). ## ### Blog ``` bash $ hexo new "My New Post" ``` : [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html) ### Run server Hexo server ``` bash $ hexo server ``` : [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html) ### ``` bash $ hexo generate ``` : [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html) ### ``` bash $ hexo deploy ``` : [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

### arr[] n ```java public static void selectionSort(int[] arr) { int min, temp, len = arr.length; for (int i = 0; i < len - 1; i++) { min = i;// for (int j = i + 1; j < len; j++) { // if (arr[min] > arr[j]) { min = j; } } if (min != i) { temp = arr[min]; // arr[min] = arr[i]; arr[i] = temp; } } } ``` ### n-1 O(n^2) N = (n-1) + (n-2) + ... + 1 = n x (n-1) / 2 O(n) 0 n-1 CPU CPU n n-1 3(n-1) 0 3n/2 O(n) **** O(n^2)**** O(1). ### ### O(n^2)

%JAVA_HOME%\bin;%JAVA_HOME%\jre\bin;Path ### Kotlin Working with the Command Line Compiler Kotlin Kotlin #### Windows [GitHub](https://github.com/JetBrains/kotlin/releases/tag/v1.1.2-5) Kotlin bin Path #### Mac & Linux Mac Linux Windows ##### SDKMAN! ```s $ curl -s https://get.sdkman.io | bash $ sdk install kotlin ``` ##### Homebrew ```s $ brew update $ brew install kotlin ``` ##### MacPorts ```s $ sudo port install kotlin ``` ## Kotlin hell.kt .kt Kotlin ``` kotlin fun main(args: Array) { println("Hello, World!") } ``` (Terminal) ```s $ kotlinc hello.kt -include-runtime -d hello.jar ``` kotlinc javachello.kt -include-runtime kotlin hello.kt .jar -d .jar Kotlin JVM jar ```s $ java -jar hello.jar ``` `Hello, World!` - - - Kotlin .jar ```s $ kotlinc hello.kt -d hello.jar ``` library Kotlin ```s $ kotlin -classpath hello.jar HelloKt ``` HelloKt Kotlin hello.kt hello.jar HelloKt hello.jar HelloKt ## Kotlin shell Kotlin Shell shell shell ```s $ kotlinc-jvm ``` ```s Welcome to Kotlin version 1.1.2-5 (JRE 1.8.0_112-b15) Type :help for help, :quit for quit ``` :quit ## Kotlin Kotlin Kotlin .kts hello.kts ``` println("Hello Kotlin Script!") ``` ```s $ kotlinc -script hello.kts ``` ``` Hello Kotlin Script! ``` Kotlin Kotlin Kotlin [JetBrains/kotlin: Working with the Command Line Compiler](http://kotlinlang.org/docs/tutorials/command-line.html)
